doctor.name: Dr. Abul Hayat Manik
doctor.workplace: Dhaka Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Abul Hayat Manik is a highly skilled Hepatology Specialist, specializing in the treatment of liver, gallbladder, jaundice, and pancreas-related diseases. He holds an MBBS degree, is a BCS (Health) cadre, and has earned an MD in Hepatology. With advanced training in Interventional Endoscopy from India and Malaysia, he is an expert in diagnosing and managing conditions such as hepatitis (B & C), liver cirrhosis, fatty liver disease, gallbladder stones, pancreatitis, and gastrointestinal bleeding. As a Registrar in the Hepatology Department at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital, he actively contributes to liver disease research and treatment advancements. He is also a member of the Asian Pacific Association for the Study of Liver (APASL) and serves as an Executive Member of the Association for the Study of Liver Diseases, Bangladesh (ASLDB).

chamber.address: Gemcon Business Tower, 255 New Circular Road, Malibagh, Dhaka

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Mamun Al Mahtab Shwapnil
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Mamun Al Mahtab Shwapnil is a renowned hepatologist and gastroenterologist in Bangladesh with extensive expertise in liver and digestive diseases. Holding an MBBS, MSc in Gastroenterology from London, and an MD in Hepatology, he has also earned prestigious fellowships, including FICP (India), FRCP (Ireland, London), FBAS, and a PhD from the University of Malaya. As the Head of the Interventional Hepatology Division and former Chairman of the Department of Hepatology at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital, he specializes in treating liver cirrhosis, hepatitis B and C, fatty liver disease, and gastrointestinal disorders. He consults at Farabi General Hospital, Dhanmondi, Dhaka, from 4 PM to 11 PM (closed on Fridays).

chamber.address: House # 8/3, Road # 14 (New), Dhanmondi R/A, (West Side of Sobhanbag Mosque), Dhaka

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Mobin Khan
doctor.degree: MBBS, MSC (Hepatology), FCPS (BD & PK),  FRCP (Glasg & Edin), FACP (USA), FCCP (USA)
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Prof Dr Mobin Khan, former treasurer of Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University and founding chairman of the hepatology department, has passed away. He died on Thursday around 3:30pm while receiving treatment in the intensive care unit at Anwer Khan Modern Medical College Hospital in Dhaka. He was 75 years old. Dr Fazle Fahim of the hospital’s hepatology department told bdnews24.com, “Sir was ill due to age-related complications and had Parkinson’s disease. He was admitted here for treatment.”
